name: Samy's Mind V0.01
description:
How To Play :

WASD - Move

Mouse - Camera 

There is 2 cubes blue gives you speed and red gives your lower speed

and the 2 health bars red lows if you take blue cubes and vice versa.

this is a video for how to play the game :


Samy's Mind,

Your Are A Cell in Brain Of Samy And Tries to Let Samy Wake Up

----------

سامي,

انت خلية مخ بداخل عقل سامي ويجب ان تيقظة من الغيبوبة
